verses.translation_en: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
verses.translation_zh: 奉至仁至慈的真主之名

verses.translation_en: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds -
verses.translation_zh: 一切赞颂全归真主，众世界 的主，

verses.translation_en: The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.
It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
verses.translation_zh: 我们只崇拜你，只求你祐助

verses.translation_en: Guide us to the straight path -

verses.text: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation_en: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have evoked [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
verses.translation_zh: 你所祐助者的路，不是受谴怒者的路，也不是迷误者的路。
